channel.title: Need help adding drops to corp and Torm deamons [PI]
channel.description: Title says all i tryed everything. I went in NPCDrops.CFG and changed what I wanted and into NPCDrops.TSM and nothing still help!

item.title: Need help adding drops to corp and Torm deamons [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

You want to go into NPCDrops.TSM to edit the drops. Make sure your format is like this:

#Man 1:5 995:500 995:10000

1 = Npc id (I used man in this case)
5 = 1:5 ration/every 5 kills, you should get 10,000 coins
995 = item id
500 = amount

Make sure you separate the rare drop (995:10000 in this case) by a space, putting it on the second line. I made that mistake for quite awhile and did not put it on the second line.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help adding drops to corp and Torm deamons [PI]

item.title: Need help adding drops to corp and Torm deamons [PI]
item.dc:creator: @kid2kewl2bereal kid2kewl2bereal
item.description:
@kid2kewl2bereal wrote:

Are you using ErasedPKz source? Because mine had two folders with my .cfg files and such, like, one was in the Bin folder and the other was in the Data folder. The correct files were in the Data folder, and the Bin ones were useless (Well, most/all of the .cfg and .tsm files were)

Read full topic
